contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Information | Description = Logo of the [[Deutsche Forschungsanstalt für Segelflug]], or '''DFS''' (German Research Institute for Sailplane Flight) | Source = Scan from historical document | Date = | Location = | Author = [[Deutsche Forschungsanstalt für Segelflug]], or DFS (German Research Institute for Sailplane Flight) | Permission = Non-free logo }} ==Fair use rationale== {{Non-free use rationale|Description= Logo of the [[Deutsche Forschungsanstalt für Segelflug]], or DFS (German Research Institute for Sailplane Flight) |Source= Scan from historical document | Date = |Portion=logo |Resolution= |Article=Deutsche Forschungsanstalt für Segelflug |Purpose=From Scan from historical document for fair use on [[Deutsche Forschungsanstalt für Segelflug]] # This image is a low-resolution image of an organization's logo. # This image does not limit the copyright holder's ability to profit from the original source, nor will it dilute the importance or recognition of the logo in connection with its organization. # This image enhances the article in which it's displayed, as it provides an immediate relevance to the reader more capably than the textual description alone. #Use of the organization's logo visually identifies the organization and its products in a manner that mere prose cannot, and meets all criteria in [[WP:NFCC]]. |Replaceability=Not replaceable; logos are always presumed non-free. }} == Licensing == {{Non-free logo|image has rationale=yes}} [[Category:Aviation logos]] [[Category:Aircraft manufacturers of Germany]]
